DOC.brief_summary: Study determine safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics immunogenicity single intravenous administration GGF2 patient heart failure .
DOC.brief_title: Single Ascending Doses GGF2 Patients With Left Ventricular Dysfunction Symptomatic Heart Failure
DOC.detailed_description: Phase 1 , double-blind , placebo-controlled , dose escalation study determine safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics immunogenicity single intravenous administration GGF2 cohorts patient leave ventricular dysfunction symptomatic heart failure .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) 10 % 40 % . 2 . Male female , age 18 75 year , inclusive . 1 . Received investigational agent participation clinical study investigational agent investigational therapy 30 day prior screen visit . 2 . Use new prescription medication 14 day prior receive investigational drug . 3 . Patients know specific hepatic disease ; bilirubin > 2 mg/dL , SGOT > 100 IU . 4 . Patients history hepatic impairment ( hepatitis B C ) . 5 . Serum creatinine > 2.5 mg/dL . 6 . Documented stroke transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) within 60 day study enrollment .
